headline: Recreation.gov, the National Park Booking App, Leaves Users Feeling Lost in the Woods
description: Little availability for campsites. Confusing booking windows. Traveler and travel industry frustration is growing with Recreation.gov, the online portal to book accommodations and access on federal lands.
headline_zh-Hans: 国家公园预订应用程序Recreation.gov让用户感到迷失在森林里
headline_zh-Hant: 國家公園預訂應用程序Recreation.gov讓用戶感到迷失在森林裡
description_zh-Hans: 营地的可用性很小。混乱的预订窗口。旅行者和旅游行业对Recreation.gov的挫折感越来越强，Recreation.gov是预订联邦土地上的住宿和访问的在线门户。
description_zh-Hant: 營地的可用性很小。混亂的預訂窗口。旅行者和旅遊行業對Recreation.gov的挫折感越來越強，Recreation.gov是預訂聯邦土地上的住宿和訪問的在線門戶。
